attributes.comment:
Please do not increase the cost of the following items...I600, I600A, N565,
N600...adoption is expensive enough and we began our journey wanting to save
the life of a child. The US is a melting pot of immigrants...what better way to help
abolish terrorism in foreign 3rd world countries than to bring these children into
american homes where parents will love and protect them...raising them to be
good citizens and advocates of what the US stands for. The benefit that the US
derives from the international adoption process far outweighs the increase in fees.
However, the potential parents and children must suffer when there is an increase
in fees. Please consider the burden you place on us!

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Jeanne S. Damon
